title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—use in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama—Maven dependency to embed local LLMs in JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama for chat, completion and model management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for RAG pipelines and question-answering.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with locally hosted Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama for quick internal LLM demos.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Unified web UI supporting both Ollama and GPT4All backends for side-by-side model comparison.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models to generate or summarize notes on-device.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres and GPU support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go SDK for Ollama with generated OpenAPI client and examples.
